achre4.blurb: Accounts of Chemical Research publishes short, concise and critical articles offering easy-to-read overviews of basic research and applications in all areas of chemistry.

aamick.blurb: ACS Applied Materials & Interfaces is for chemists, engineers, physicists and biologists researching materials and interfacial processes for specific applications.

aabmcb.blurb: ACS Applied Bio Materials is an interdisciplinary journal publishing research articles covering all aspects of biomaterials, biointerfaces, and applications.

aaemcq.blurb: An interdisciplinary journal publishing research articles on materials, engineering, chemistry, physics and biology relevant to energy applications.

aanmf6.blurb: ACS Applied Nano Materials covers all aspects of engineering, chemistry, physics and biology relevant to applications of nanomaterials.

aapmcd.blurb: ACS Applied Polymer Materials covers all aspects of engineering, chemistry, physics, and biology relevant to applications of polymers.

aaembp.blurb: ACS Applied Electronic Materials is an interdisciplinary journal covering all aspects of electronic materials and applications.

aaemdr.blurb: ACS Applied Engineering Materials covers materials science applications at the intersection of engineering, physics, and chemistry.

aaoma6.blurb: ACS Applied Optical Materials reports chemistry, materials, engineering, and physics research in optical & photonic materials and applications.

aastgj.blurb: ACS Agricultural Science & Technology reports high quality research across agricultural science, technology, and engineering.

abmcb8.blurb: ACS Bio & Med Chem Au covers the chemical, physical, biological, mechanistic, and structural basis of biological function.

abseba.blurb: ACS Biomaterials Science & Engineering covers biomaterials science, technology and engineering research and applications to biomedicine, bioengineering and clinical translation.

accacs.blurb: ACS Catalysis focuses on experimental and theoretical studies on molecules, macromolecules, and materials that are catalytic in nature.

acscii.blurb: ACS Central Science publishes the most compelling discoveries with exceptional impact in the physical and life sciences in which chemistry has a central role.

acbcct.blurb: ACS Chemical Biology reports research on cellular processes using in vitro, cellular or whole organism studies at the chemical and biological interface.

achsc5.blurb: ACS Chemical Health & Safety reports on chemical safety, security, risk assessment and management, incident case studies and hazard warnings, and other influential safety topics.

acncdm.blurb: ACS Chemical Neuroscience reports chemical, biological, biophysical, and bioengineering research on the nervous system and neurological disorders.

acsccc.blurb: ACS Combinatorial Science published research describing the development and use of combinatorial, high-throughput, and related methods in chemistry, materials science, and biology.

aeacb3.blurb: ACS Engineering Au reports chemical engineering, applied chemistry, and energy research applied to large-scale manufacturing operations, processes and products.

aeacc4.blurb: ACS Environmental Au covers environmental science, technology and green chemistry including experimental and theoretical methods.

aeacd5.blurb: ACS ES&T Air reports original research on outdoor and indoor air quality sciences, engineering, chemistry and physics, treatment, climate change, and human health and ecological impacts.

aeecco.blurb: ACS ES&T Engineering reports high-impact research in all areas of environmental technology and engineering.

aeclc7.blurb: ACS Electrochemistry is an international journal for high-quality, cutting-edge original research in all areas of electrochemistry.

aesccq.blurb: ACS Earth and Space Chemistry advances interdisciplinary application of chemistry to natural materials and processes in Earth's interior, surface, and atmosphere, and in space.

aelccp.blurb: ACS Energy Letters reports breakthrough findings on energy materials, storage and conversion, solar cells and fuels, supercapacitors, LEDs, photosynthesis and biofuels, and photovoltaics.

aewcaa.blurb: ACS ES&T Water reports research and policy spanning all aspects of water quality, chemistry, treatment, protection, and sustainable use/reuse and supply.

afsthl.blurb: ACS Food Science & Technology reports high quality research across food science, technology, engineering, and nutrition.

aidcbc.blurb: ACS Infectious Diseases highlights the role of chemistry in the multidisciplinary and collaborative field of infectious diseases.

amacgu.blurb: ACS Materials Au publishes fundamental and applied materials science at the interface between materials and chemistry, engineering and biology.

amlcef.blurb: ACS Materials Letters reports transformative research on the design, synthesis, structure, properties, performance, development and applications of emerging materials.

amlccd.blurb: ACS Macro Letters publishes urgent communications of polymer and biopolymer science.

amachv.blurb: ACS Measurement Science Au publishes measurement and analytical science from sampling and measurement to data analysis to improve chemical and biological measurement procedures.

amclct.blurb: ACS Medicinal Chemistry Letters reports new findings in drug discovery, compound design and optimization, biological evaluation, drug delivery, imaging agents, and pharmacology.

amrcda.blurb: Accounts of Materials Research publishes concise personal reviews and viewpoints describing recent developments in materials science and engineering.

ancac3.blurb: ACS Nano reports breakthrough studies on nanostructure synthesis, assembly and characterization, nanoscience theory, tools and methods, nanobiotechnology and nanofabrication.

anaccx.blurb: ACS Nanoscience Au reports nanoscience & nanotechnology research at the interfaces of chemistry, biology, materials science, physics, and engineering.

acsodf.blurb: ACS Omega is an open access, broad-scope journal focused on original chemical insight, sound scientific principles, and robust experimentation rather than immediate significance.

aoiab5.blurb: ACS Organic & Inorganic Au covers experimental and theoretical studies on organic, inorganic, catalytic, organometallic & natural product chemistry, and crystallography.

aptsfn.blurb: ACS Pharmacology & Translational Science reports advances in molecular and biological science, from basic and preclinical studies to clinical trials.

apchd5.blurb: ACS Photonics reports interdisciplinary physics, chemical, and engineering research in photonics science and technology.

apcach.blurb: ACS Physical Chemistry Au reports experimental, theoretical & computational physical chemistry and chemical physics across molecules, matter, clusters, energy, materials and catalysis.

apaccd.blurb: ACS Polymers Au publishes polymer, macromolecular and soft matter science covering synthesis, properties, self-assembly, supramolecular chemistry, biomaterials, and sustainability.

ascefj.blurb: ACS Sensors publishes sensor science that yields substantial advances in the detection of chemical or biological species or processes.

ascecg.blurb: ACS Sustainable Chemistry & Engineering advances green chemistry and engineering to address grand challenges in sustainable energy, materials, and chemical manufacturing.

asrmcd.blurb: ACS Sustainable Resource Management reports sustainable management of natural and waste resources towards circular net-zero chemical economy supporting the UN Sustainable Development Goals.

asbcd6.blurb: ACS Synthetic Biology is the premier publication forum for research in synthetic biology.

ancham.blurb: Analytical Chemistry publishes compelling research articles advancing chemical measurement science from significant fundamentals to innovative applications.

apwdam.blurb: Artificial Photosynthesis reports advances in understanding, mimicking, and utilizing the conversion of sunlight into chemical energy.

bichaw.blurb: Biochemistry publishes exceptional, rigorous, high-impact research across all of biological chemistry.

bcches.blurb: Bioconjugate Chemistry covers bioconjugate science, including preparation, properties and applications of biomolecular conjugates.

bomaf6.blurb: Biomacromolecules publishes cutting-edge research articles at the interface of polymer science and biology.

crtoec.blurb: Chemical Research in Toxicology reports ground-breaking research on the chemical and molecular basis of toxicology for intelligent solutions to human and environmental health and safety.

chreay.blurb: Chemical Reviews publishes comprehensive, authoritative, critical reviews of important advances in organic, inorganic, physical, analytical, theoretical, and biological chemistry.

cbehb5.blurb: Chem & Bio Engineering is a peer-reviewed, open-access journal that publishes significant advances in all aspects of chemical and biological engineering.

cbihbp.blurb: Chemical & Biomedical Imaging publishes cutting-edge, open access papers on all aspects of chemical and biomedical imaging.

cmatex.blurb: Chemistry of Materials reports fundamental research at the interface of chemistry, chemical engineering, and materials science.

cgdefu.blurb: Crystal Growth & Design shares new scientific & engineering knowledge of crystal growth, crystal engineering, and application of crystalline materials.

enfuem.blurb: Energy & Fuels reports advances in batteries and energy storage, fuel cells, solar energy, light conversion, bioenergy, fossil fuels, carbon capture, carbon-free fuels, and more.

ehnea2.blurb: Environment & Health, an open access journal, explores relationships between the environment and the health of individuals and communities.

esthag.blurb: Environmental Science & Technology reports impactful, groundbreaking, world-class research across a diverse range of environmentally relevant topics.

estlcu.blurb: Environmental Science & Technology Letters shares timely, urgent and high-quality communications on pure and applied environmental science and technology.

iecred.blurb: Industrial & Engineering Chemistry Research reports experimental, computational, or theoretical research on applied chemistry, and chemical and biomolecular engineering.

inocaj.blurb: Inorganic Chemistry reports experimental and theoretical studies on coordination chemistry, main-group chemistry, catalysis, inorganic materials, and bioinorganic chemistry.

jaaucr.blurb: JACS Au, an open access journal, reports research across analytical, physical, inorganic, organic, medicinal, environmental, catalytic, and theoretical chemistry.

jacsat.tagline: The Journal of the American Chemical Society (JACS), founded in 1879, is the flagship journal of the American Chemical Society
jacsat.blurb: The flagship journal of the American Chemical Society, JACS publishes significant, highly cited articles with broad interest across all chemical science.

jafcau.blurb: Journal of Agricultural and Food Chemistry publishes cutting-edge studies and reviews on the chemistry and biochemistry of agriculture and food.

jamsef.blurb: Journal of the American Society for Mass Spectrometry covers mass spectrometry research, and scientific inquiry in which mass spectrometry plays a role.

jceaax.blurb: Journal of Chemical & Engineering Data reports relevant, comprehensive, and robust thermophysical properties and phase equilibria for well-defined chemical systems obtained from experiment or computation.

jceda8.blurb: Journal of Chemical Education advances chemistry teaching and learning, and chemistry education research addressing laboratory experiments, curricula, and pedagogies.

copyright.statement: © American Chemical Society and Division of Chemical Education, Inc.

jcisd8.blurb: Journal of Chemical Information and Modeling reports cutting-edge new methodologies and applications in chemical informatics and molecular modeling.

jctcce.blurb: Journal of Chemical Theory and Computation reports new theories, methods, and important applications in quantum electronic structure, molecular dynamics, and statistical mechanics.

jmcmar.blurb: Journal of Medicinal Chemistry reports research relationships between molecular structure and biological activity or mode of action in drug discovery and development.

jnprdf.blurb: Journal of Natural Products reports research on the chemistry or biochemistry of naturally occurring compounds or the biology of their living systems and environments.

copyright.statement: © American Chemical Society and American Society of Pharmacognosy

joceah.blurb: The Journal of Organic Chemistry reports novel synthetic methods and mechanisms in organic, natural product and medicinal chemistry, biochemistry and chemical biology.

jpcafh.blurb: The Journal of Physical Chemistry A reports experimental, theoretical, and computational research on the physical chemistry of molecules, clusters, and aerosols.

jpcbfk.blurb: The Journal of Physical Chemistry B reports experimental, theoretical and computational research articles in biophysics, biomaterials, liquids, and soft matter.

jpccck.blurb: The Journal of Physical Chemistry C reports experimental, theoretical and computational research in energy, materials, and catalysis.

jpclcd.blurb: The Journal of Physical Chemistry Letters rapidly disseminates high-quality communications at the forefront of physical chemistry.

jprobs.blurb: Journal of Proteome Research reports on global protein analysis and function, including genomics, spatio-temporal proteomics, metabonomics and metabolomics, and clinical proteomics.

langd5.blurb: Langmuir highlights the science and application of systems and materials in which the interface dominates structure and function.

mamobx.blurb: Macromolecules publishes research articles at the cutting-edge of polymer science.

mpohbp.blurb: Molecular Pharmaceutics publishes findings on the molecular mechanistic understanding of drug delivery and drug delivery systems.

nalefd.blurb: Nano Letters is the global home for communications in nanoscience and nanotechnology.

orlef7.blurb: Organic Letters rapidly publishes short reports on creative, innovative organic synthesis, from catalysis to natural products to functional materials.

oprdfk.blurb: Organic Process Research & Development reports research on safe, environmentally benign and economical synthesis and manufacture of organic compounds at industrial scale.

orgnd7.blurb: Organometallics reports research in organic and inorganic chemistry on the synthesis, structure, reactivity and applications of novel organometallic compounds.

pcrhej.blurb: Precision Chemistry reports fundamental, applied and interdisciplinary research towards precision calculation, design, synthesis, manipulation, measurement and manufacturing.

psabav.blurb: Photon Science publishes cutting-edge photon-based scientific research and technical innovations.

pstoco.blurb: Polymer Science & Technology, an open-access journal, reports cutting-edge polymer and related interdisciplinary research linked to the pressing needs of human society.
